name: Dantes Bullet Inferno
description:
Experience the sequel to the historical epic Dante’s Inferno, by descending into hell and finishing of the Devil!
Shoot, dodge, and prevail through the five unforgiving levels in this hectic shoot em up!

Fight hell's demons on two planes, and utilize riding the danger zone for more firepower. If your skills are up to par, take on the speed-run mode Time Dilation!
This is the first production of Pentagram Studios, we hope you enjoy it!
